name: OpenAI
description: Used in various applications such as text generation, translation, summarization, and question answering that resemble human-like text.

name: Bedrock
description: Supports various language models including AI21 Labs, Titan, Anthropic, Cohere, Meta, Mistral AI, and Stability AI.

name: Anthropic
description: Anthropic focuses on AI safety and research, aiming to develop human-friendly and reliable AI systems.

name: Gemini
description: Gemini is Google's AI language model used for various tasks including conversational AI, text generation and analysis, and translation.

name: Amazon S3
description: Supports various file formats and sizes, allowing easy web-based upload and download of data.

name: Google Drive
description: Part of Google Workspace, Google Drive provides a secure place to back up and access all your files from any device.

name: FAISS
description: FAISS (Facebook AI Similarity Search) is a library developed by Facebook AI Research for efficient similarity search and clustering of dense vectors.

name: ChromaDB
description: ChromaDB is a blockchain-based database that provides data storage and management for smart contracts and decentralized applications.

name: Pinecone
description: A cloud-based platform for real-time vector search and similarity search, enabling fast exploration of vector similarities in large datasets.

name: Snowflake
description: Snowflake is a cloud-based data warehouse that enables fast, secure, and scalable data storage and analytics for various business needs.

name: GITHub
description: Git is a distributed version control system that allows every developer to have a local copy of the entire codebase.

name: Notion
description: Notion provides an all-in-one workspace where you can write, plan, manage projects, and maintain databases.
